content.question: Which of the following best explains the historical situation that prompted Kollontai to make the argument in the passage?

choices.label: The large number of casualties during the First World War had significantly altered Russia's demographics.
The Bolsheviks had promised to radically transform Russian society on the basis of Marxist principles of equality.
The Bolsheviks were engaged in a civil war with conservative supporters of the monarchy, who were backed by the Western Allies.
The First World War shifted many women into factory and industrial labor in order to support the war effort.

content.answer: The Bolsheviks had promised to radically transform Russian society on the basis of Marxist principles of equality.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
